mapper.select: select b.bd_no, b.mp_no, b.titl, b.text, b.rdt, p.bd_path from board b left outer join board_phots p on b.bd_no = p.bd_no
mapper.insert: insert into board(mp_no, bd_no, titl, text, rdt) values(#{mpNo}, #{bdNo}, #{bdTitle}, #{bdContent}, CURRENT_DATE())
mapper.select: select b.bd_no, b.titl, b.text, b.rdt, p.bd_path from board b left outer join board_phots p on b.bd_no = p.bd_no where b.bd_no = #{bdNo}
select b.bd_no, b.titl, b.text, p.bd_path from board b left outer join board_phots p on b.bd_no = p.bd_no where titl like '%${value}%' || text like '%${value}%'
